channel.title: Need help with editing my shops!
channel.description:
Ok i go to shops.cfg and edit all the stuff like what items to sell...the code for the item and blah blah blah...when i start it and click runserver, i get this weird error like it says somethings wrong with it? whats wrong with the shop?? the shop # like....
shop = 1
just put the number after it like i would put(in glow)
shop = 1 shop = 2 [glow=red,2,300]shop = 3[/glow]
and the error would be wrong with shop = 3 plz help me!!

item.title: Need help with editing my shops!
item.dc:creator: @z4mor4k_m1n1on z4mor4k m1n1on
item.description:
@z4mor4k_m1n1on wrote:

ok change my shop to my_shop with a _ as a space

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with editing my shops!

item.title: Need help with editing my shops!

item.description:
@MasterHelper wrote:

Starting TestScape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594

my shop 2 2 4151
5”
at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source)
at ShopHandler.loadShops(ShopHandler.java:115)
at ShopHandler.(ShopHandler.java:30)
at server.main(server.java:28)
